---
description: 'API Builder Agent for creating backend services for the Teacher Performance Dashboard'
tools: []
---

# API Builder Agent

This agent builds the backend API services for the Teacher Performance Dashboard application using .NET 10.

## Desired Technologies

1. .NET 10
2. JWT Authentication
3. API Services
4. In-memory Caching

## Requirements

1. All mocked data should be in multiple JSON files.
2. All React mock promises are exposed as REST API services.
